Package fr.Adrien1106.util.protocol

Interface ClientProtocol

public interface ClientProtocol
Defines the methods that the scrabble Client should support.
Author:
Adrien1106

  • Method Details

    • handleConnect

      void handleConnect() throws ServerUnavailableException
      Handles a connection confirmation
      Throws:
      ServerUnavailableException - if IO errors occur.

    • doJoinRoom

      String doJoinRoom​(String room_id) throws UnknownRoomException, RoomFullException
      Called when the player join a room
      Parameters:
      room_id -
      Returns:
      an initialization of the room (table, players that are already in the game);
      Throws:
      UnknownRoomException
      RoomFullException

    • doCreateRoom

      String doCreateRoom​(String player_number) throws TooManyPlayersException, TooFewPlayersException
      Called when a new room is being created
      Returns:
      a room id that the person just created
      Throws:
      TooManyPlayersException
      TooFewPlayersException

    • doInitiateGame

      void doInitiateGame​(String table, String players)
      Called when joining a room
      Parameters:
      table - - the table sent by the server
      players - - the players that are part of the room

    • doAddOrRemovePlayer

      void doAddOrRemovePlayer​(String player)
      Called when a player join or leave the server
      Parameters:
      player - - player added (name#number)

    • doMove

      String doMove​(String alignment, String coordinates, String word) throws NotOwnedTileException, NotTurnException, WordOutOfBoundsException, UnknownTileException, WrongCoordinateException
      Called when the player does a move
      Parameters:
      alignment -
      coordinates -
      word -
      Returns:
      if move has been accepted
      Throws:
      NotOwnedTileException
      NotTurnException
      WordOutOfBoundsException
      UnknownTileException
      WrongCoordinateException

    • handleFeeback

      void handleFeeback​(String accepted)
      Called after each actions that needs to be checked by the server
      Parameters:
      accepted - - boolean sent as a feedback by the server

    • handleTableUpdate

      void handleTableUpdate​(String table)
      Called when an update of the table is sent by the server
      Parameters:
      table - - the table sent by the server

    • handleScoreUpdate

      void handleScoreUpdate​(String player, String score)
      Called when the score of a player is being updated
      Parameters:
      player - - player for which the score is being updated (name#number)
      score - - the new score to apply to the given player

    • handleRecievingTiles

      void handleRecievingTiles​(String tiles)
      Called when the server sends tiles to the player
      Parameters:
      tiles - - string of tiles ("ABC" for 3 tiles)

    • handleFinishGame

      void handleFinishGame​(String player, String score)
      Called when the game is finished
      Parameters:
      player - - player(s) that won the game
      score - - score(s) of the player(s)

    • doSkip

      String doSkip()
      Called when a player want to skip his turn
      Returns:
      if skipping is accepted

    • doReplaceTiles

      String doReplaceTiles​(String tiles) throws UnknownTileException
      Called when a player want to replace some tiles
      Parameters:
      tiles - - tiles to be replaced
      Returns:
      new tiles to be sent to the client
      Throws:
      UnknownTileException

    • doDisconnect

      void doDisconnect()
      Called when a player disconnects from the server
